text: aaj subah se headache ho raha hai, painkiller liya but kuch zyada farak nahi pada. chai peene ke baad thoda better feel ho raha hai. mood bhi thik nahi hai yaar, kaam pe stress bahut hai.
periods start ho gaye kal, cramps ekdum heavy hai. hot water bottle se thoda relief mila. chocolate kha liya comfort ke liye lol. emotional bhi feel ho raha hai, rona aa raha hai for no reason.
lunch mein dal chawal khaya, bahut tasty tha. stomach feels good today, no bloating ya kuch bhi. exercise bhi kiya morning mein, feeling energetic. mummy ne bola well done beta!
anxiety ho raha hai interview ke baare mein kal. heart race kar raha hai randomly. tried deep breathing but mind keeps wandering. sleep bhi properly nahi aa rahi last 2 nights se.
dinner mein pizza order kiya, bahut oil tha. ab acidity feel ho rahi hai. paani peena chahiye tha instead. stressed about weight gain also. kal pakka healthy khaungi.
neend achi aayi finally! no headache today, feeling fresh. nashta mein poha khaya with chai. plan hai walk pe jaana evening mein. positive vibes today.
back pain ho raha hai sitting se. wfh ka side effect hai yeh. need to buy better chair. stretching kiya thoda but still stiff. posture kharab ho gayi hai.
period cramps abhi bhi hai but lighter. painkiller nahi liya aaj, manageable hai. green tea pi rahi hoon. friend se baat ki phone pe, mood better hua.
dinner skip kar diya, appetite nahi hai. bas ek apple khaya. overthinking ho rahi hai future ke baare mein. need to meditate but laziness.
nightmare aaya kal raat, pura disturbed feel. coffee peeker hi kaam shuru kiya. body tired hai but mind nahi sone de raha. yeh cycle khatam karna hai.
